data.prayer: Father, we ask for 665 new simple churches in the state of Al Jizah, Egypt. Place a simple church in every community of the 3,326,400 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Jizah, Egypt

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Al Jizah, Egypt, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 22 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 3,326,400 people living in Al Jizah, Egypt. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Al Jizah to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Tuareg, Algerian people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of Al Jizah against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Al Jizah, Egypt need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Al Jizah, Egypt.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

location.name: Al Jizah
location.cities_list: Giza, Al Ḩawāmidīyah, Awsīm, Madīnat Sittah Uktūbar, Aş Şaff
location.cities_list_w_pop: Giza (2,443,203), Al Ḩawāmidīyah (106,841), Awsīm (63,862), Madīnat Sittah Uktūbar (41,930), Aş Şaff (38,213)
